Key Match Events: LeBron James and Anthony Davis combined for 63 points in the fourth quarter
The Lakers trailed 94-87 heading into the final period but opened the fourth on a 21-0 scoring run
James found Davis for a three-pointer and Rui Hachimura for a dunk and the Lakers held on for the win
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles, California
Others: Domantas Sabonis had a triple-double of 29 points, 12 rebounds and 10 assists for the Kings
De'Aaron Fox and DeMar DeRozan contributed 28 points and 10 assists and 23 points respectively for the Kings
